answers.answer: Hi Staley,Calves burning after doing simple stretch can be due to various causes. Viral respiratory infections or Diabetes Mellitus or Diabetic Neuropathy can have similar symptoms.
Thanks for your post. I've had the symptoms for 2 years. Glucose levels were on the upper side of normal. EMG/NCV studies taken last month were also normal. No answer from my doctors.

question: My calves burn after doing simple stretches for them. They feel so tight, but when I stretch them they burn. Any ideas?
title: burning tight calves
